Class TextWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup

          • com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.widget.TextWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewFileFragment.DetailView

    public class TextWidget
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Simple widget that is a label and a delete button. There is no editable mode to this widget
    Author:
    codymunger
